    • 方法详细资料

      • createRoom

        public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<String> createRoom(String name,
                                                      String description,
                                                      String owner)
        Create a room.
        参数:
        name - the room's name
        description - the room's description
        owner - the owner's username
        返回:
        A Mono which emits EMRoom.

      • createRoom

        public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<String> createRoom(String name,
                                                      String description,
                                                      String owner,
                                                      List<String> members,
                                                      int maxMembers)
        Create a room.
        参数:
        name - the room's name
        description - the room's description
        owner - the owner's username
        members - the rooms members
        maxMembers - max members count
        返回:
        A Mono which emits EMRoom.

      • getRoom

        public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<EMRoom> getRoom(String id)
        Get the room's detail by id.
        参数:
        id - the room's id
        返回:
        A Mono which emits EMRoomDetail.

      • updateRoom

        public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Void> updateRoom(String id,
                                                    Consumer<UpdateRoomRequest> customizer)
        Update the room. Currently, you can update: - name - description - maxMembers More fields will be added. To update room's name, you can: 
        
  EMService service;
  service.updateRoom(roomId, request -> request.withName("some cool name")).block(timeout);
        参数:
        id - the room's id
        customizer - the update request customizer
        返回:
        A Mono which complete upon success.

      • listRoomsAll

        public reactor.core.publisher.Flux<String> listRoomsAll()
        List all rooms.
        返回:
        A Flux which emits each room's id.

      • listRooms

        public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<ListRoomsResponse> listRooms(int limit,
                                                                String cursor)
        List rooms iteratively.
        参数:
        limit - how many rooms to return
        cursor - where to continue, returned in previous response. For the first call, pass null.
        返回:
        A Mono which emits ListRoomsResponse upon success.

      • listRoomsUserJoined

        public reactor.core.publisher.Flux<String> listRoomsUserJoined(String username)
        List rooms user joined.
        参数:
        username - the user's username
        返回:
        A Flux of each room's id.

      • listRoomMembersAll

        public reactor.core.publisher.Flux<String> listRoomMembersAll(String roomId)
        List room members iteratively.
        参数:
        roomId - the room's id
        返回:
        A Flux of member's username.

      • listRoomMembers

        public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<ListRoomMembersResponse> listRoomMembers(String roomId,
                                                                            int limit,
                                                                            String cursor)
        List room members.
        参数:
        roomId - the room's id
        limit - how many members to return
        cursor - where to start, returned in previous call. For the first call, pass null.
        返回:
        A Mono of ListRoomMembersResponse.

                                                       String username)
        Add a member to the room.
        参数:
        roomId - the room's id
        username - the user's username
        返回:
        A Mono which completes upon success.

        返回:
